post.description: Create ou update one or more webhooks.

parameters.name: includeRedirections
parameters.description: Flag to add the list of the delivery redirections to the results *(Brand API key only)*

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Add the delivery zones and/or the billing details to the results

application/json.example:
{
    "restaurants": [
        {
            "id": 42,
            "remote_id": "remote_42",
            "disable": false,
            "name": "Zelty Resto",
            "description": "Description du restaurant",
            "country_code": "FR",
            "currency": "EUR",
            "image": "https://....png",
            "default_lang": "fr",
            "takeaway_delay": 15,
            "delivery_time": 45,
            "delay": 15,
            "delivery_charge": 0,
            "delivery_charge_tva": 2000,
            "delivery_minimum": 1500,
            "delivery_no_charge_min": 2500,
            "delivery_hours": { ... },
            "opening_hours": { ... },
            "opening_hours_txt": "Du lundi au samedi de 9h à 15h",
            "happy_hours": { ... },
            "closures": [],
            "address": "61 Rue de Cléry 75002 Paris",
            "phone": "+33123456789",
            "public_name": "Restaurant Zelty",
            "online_ordering_hidden": false,
            "loc": { ... }
        }
    ]
}

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Zelty ID (integer) or remote ID (string) of the restaurant

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Add the delivery zones and/or the billing details to the results

is_fixed.description: Price cannot be changed at order time.

prevent_customisation.description: If true, no customisation allowed for this part.

post.description: Add transaction to an open order.

Close an order eligible to the automatic closing.
To be eligible, an order must contain some items and be paid.

Send one or more items in an open order to production.
Caution: The option `Allow the order to be sent to production from this device` should be enabled on the POS.

parameters.name: search

get.description:
Get the list of promotions.
Return the automatic and valid promotions only.

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: Filter by the Zelty ID of the customer

parameters.name: min_price
parameters.description: Filter by the minimum amount of the order (in cents)

post.description:
Create a promotion.
Promotion update is not allowed.

min_price.description: Minimum order total necessary to apply the promotion

required_items.description: List of items required to apply promotion to the order

only_once.description: Flag to make the promotion single-use only

first_command.description: Flag to make the promotion applicable on the first order only

max_uses.description: Maximum number of uses of the promotion

modeflag.description: Order fulfillment method for which the promotion is valid : eat in, takeaway, delivery

noweb.description: Flag to make the promotion invalid for use with online orders

nopos.description: Flag to make the promotion invalid for use with orders placed through the POS

repeat.description: Flag to allow unlimited repeated use of the promotion

priority.description: Priority of the promotion (without code only)

ignore_order_min_price.description: Flag to ignore the order amount minimum

customer_registered_days.description: Minimum number days since customer registration necessary in order to apply the promotion

uses.description: Number of uses of the promotion

fixed_discount.description: Fixed amount of the promotion (in euros)

percent_discount.description: Discount percentage to apply to an order when promotion is used

promo_data.description: Configuration of the promotion depending on the type

restaurants_validity_dates.description: Validity dates for the promotion for each restaurant

parameters.name: is_valid
parameters.description: Filter by the validity status of the promotion

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: Filter by the Zelty customer ID

parameters.name: min_price
parameters.description: Filter by minimum amount of the order

ret.description:
Return code
If `ret = 0` then the promotion is valid

Catalog.title: Catalog
Catalog.description:
ID conventions (indicative):
- ZDXXXXX = Zelty Dish
- ZMXXXXX = Zelty Menu
- ZOXXXXX = Zelty Options
- ZOVXXXX = Zelty Options Value
- ZTXXXXX = Zelty Tags
- ZTX XXXX = Zelty Taxe
- ZMPXXXX = Zelty Menu Part

tags.description: List of tags (categories) used to group items.

id.description: Public tag ID. See ID conventions.

items.description: List of catalog items (Dish or Menu).

type.description: Item kind. Allowed values: Dish or Menu.

disabled.description: If true, the item is disabled.

is_fixed.description: Price cannot be changed at order time.

option_ids.description: Linked option IDs attachable to this item (ZO* or ZOV*).

parts.description: Menu composition. References Menu Parts by ID.

has_combination.description: If true, part can be combined.

prevent_customisation.description: If true, no customisation allowed for this part.

minimum_choices.description: Minimum number of values to pick.

maximum_choices.description: Maximum number of values to pick.

pick_same_value.description: Allow picking the same value multiple times (for quantities).

pos_settings.description: Option is POS-only or has POS settings.

menuParts.description: Reusable menu parts that define menu composition choices.

maximum_choices.description: Maximum dishes to pick in this part.

Restaurant ID which the dish is associated to
If `null`, the dish is associated to the brand
